column4: Hello i am trying to install ubuntu and after a short while i get a blackscreen...i have enabled nomodeset and i have a ati radeon 5700 what shall i do? the error says sp5100tco timer mmio 0xfec000f0 address already in use
try the boot option:  radeon.nomodeset=1
where do i use that command?
as a boot option
the error remains the same
with the addition: unknown parameter 'nomodeset' 00f0 already in use
do you use hybrid graphics?
how do i find out
does the system have a make and model?
there is also graphics onboard...do you mean that?
have you disabled that (I assume you don't use it)
i dont think so where can i do that?
system BIOS
I cant find the onboard vga option in the bios
could try connecting the monitor to the onboard during install
sorry i dont know much about computers, how do i do that
well, the monitor is connected to the ati video card, yes?
then unplug iot and connect it to the onboard video chip
I see, is the system a laptop?
no
thought not, just checking
